name: Get To The Pipe
description:
There is a man who had a dream, a dream to find a thing that is precious to him like nothing else. He traverses an obstacle course with many traps and dangers, but he will relentlessly climb towards his goal until he finally finds ...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is currently in development, but now you can run a demonstration version of game

If you'd like to see more, please consider donating - even a dollar can go a long way in keeping me afloat while I finish the game! :)

Leave a comment and rate the game if you enjoyed it. Any input, whether positive or negative, is greatly appreciated!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play: 

Move : WASD / ↑↓→←

Jump    : SPACE

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

System requirements
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G
  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
Minimum requirements
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
